entry.title: JatinRana1/SimpleCalculator: This is a lightweight and user-friendly calculator built using React. entry.title: itsKayWat/NexusStream-Controller: NexusStream-Controller: A lightweight, open-source streaming management tool designed for NexusStream Project Ai and other well known and commonly used platforms aimed to simplify multi-platform streaming by providing centralized control over stream keys, audio/video settings, and scene management. Alternative to Streamlabs.
entry.content: NexusStream-Controller: A lightweight, open-source streaming management tool designed for NexusStream Project Ai and other well known and commonly used platforms aimed to simplify multi-platform streaming by providing centralized control over stream keys, audio/video settings, and scene management. Alternative to Streamlabs.
